events.description: Negotiations between Washington and Tehran regarding the nuclear program and regional tensions.
Announcement by Donald Trump regarding India's agreement to stop oil imports from Russia.

facts.fact_text: WTI crude oil futures fell to $63.1 per barrel on Monday.

evidences.evidence_text: WTI crude oil futures fell to $63.1 per barrel on Monday, extending the weekly decline

facts.fact_text: President Donald Trump stated that Washington had held 'very good' talks with Iran.

evidences.evidence_text: President Donald Trump said that Washington had held “very good” talks with Iran

facts.fact_text: Indian authorities have not officially confirmed the commitment to halt Russian oil imports.

evidences.evidence_text: Indian authorities have yet to officially confirm this commitment

claims.claim_text: Easing US-Iran tensions alleviated concerns of potential supply disruptions in the Middle East.

evidences.evidence_text: easing tensions between the US and Iran alleviated concerns of potential supply disruptions in the Middle East

claims.claim_text: Consequences for Tehran would be very steep if they fail to reach a nuclear agreement.
claims.author: Donald Trump

evidences.evidence_text: he also warned that “consequences” would be very steep if Tehran failed to reach an agreement over its nuclear program

claims.claim_text: Safeguarding energy security is the top priority for India.
claims.author: Indian authorities

evidences.evidence_text: instead stressing that safeguarding energy security remains their top priority

claims.claim_text: Oil prices rallied earlier in the year due to heightened geopolitical risks.

evidences.evidence_text: Earlier in the year, oil prices had rallied amid heightened geopolitical risks

evidence.evidence_text: easing tensions between the US and Iran alleviated concerns of potential supply disruptions
oil prices had rallied amid heightened geopolitical risks
New Delhi had agreed to halt oil imports from Russia as part of a broader trade deal
